text: Mansuran is a village located in the Ludhiana West tehsil, of Ludhiana district, Punjab. ==Administration== The village is administrated by a Sarpanch who is an elected representative of village as per constitution of India and Panchayati raj (India). {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Particulars !! Total !! Male!!Female |- | Total No. of Houses|| 666||6666666 |6| |- | Population ||6666||66666||1 |- |} Mansuran Village 14Km far from Ludhiana Bus stand and Railway station. Good Road convective with Near by town's. Mansuran Village also have good banking services by Oriental Bank(PNB Bank), HDFC bank, SBI. Another thing you will get here world class 2 Eyes Doctors Hospital By Dr Ramesh Mansuran and Dr Mandeep Kaur Grewal, and one Govt. Hospital Which provide gynecologist, dentist and basic medical facility. In area Mansuran Village have best education institut for girls school and college. On the Religious prospecting here you can visit and see Guru Nanak Dev ji 17th Generation at Baba Sahib Singh ji Bedi Gurdwara Damdama Sahib.Guru Gobind Singh ji relative Gurdwara Sahib Tuutan Wala Khooh, Gurdwara Bhai Bura Sahib,Gurdwara Bhagat Ravidas ji, Balmeek Ji Mandir, Shiv Mandir, Durga Mata Mandir and Old Masjid for Muslim Brother doing Navaz there. ==Villages in Ludhiana West Tehsil== ==Air travel connectivity== The closest airport to the village is Sahnewal Airport. ==References== Category:Villages in Ludhiana West tehsil
title: Mansuran (Ludhiana West)
